item.title: Ask me
item.description: Hi there! ðŸ‘‹ If you’re trying to get into tech and you belong to an under-represented group1, if you want help, I want to help. You can reach out to me via email at hello@cassie.nyc, or DM me on Twitter @cassie_moy. You can ask me to: Proofread or give feedback on your resume/portfolio/LinkedIn profile Introduce you to someone I know, if we know each other Help practice behavioral interviews, especially if you’re telling the story of why you’re trying to get into tech if you’re coming from a non-traditional background Talk through bootcamps critically, or talk through what might happen next after graduating from one Be a Meetup buddy so that you’re not going to tech events alone, if you’re in NYC 1.
